thread.section_title: Kampala Serena Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great stay
thread.title_full: great stay - Review of Kampala Serena Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: alice m
title: great stay
text:
Stayed at Kampala serena in February 2017. Rooms are big and comfortable, with a big desk and comfortable office chair if you need to work.
Service is excellent.
Breakfast buffet is good with lots of different things to choose from.
Had dinner a couple of times at the italian restaurant (explorer) which has good Italian style pasta and some times at the main buffet which varies everyday with good food and a huge salad selection.
Gym is great (with also a lesson schedule) and spa as well.
